name: SecretClues
0:
”Alexa open secret clues”
”Let's Play Bowling Alley”
”What are the top three games”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: secret clues
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Secret Clues is an interactive experience, where you uncover five secret clues. After solving for each clue, you will receive a message to help find the next clue. If you discover all 5 clues a secret message awaits you. 
 
 To see if your friends can help, tell them to go to getsecretclues.com/alexa. 
 
HOW TO PLAY: 
Start the game by saying Alexa, Open Secret Clues. Next you are prompted to select a game. From here you will need to provide a clue by saying the clue directly, something like it is followed by the clue, or the answer is clue. Once you have provided all 5 clues to the game the secret message will be played. If you want to start over you can say something like reboot my game when prompted. 
 
To start the featured game right away you can go to http://getsecretclues.com/featured. This will start the featured game. 
 
 
GAMES: 
The current games are Bowling Alley, Roller Skating Rink, Winter Sports, Iron Horse, Beach Day, Puppies, Remember, Save Xavier, Boredom Rescue, Fire Safety, Chompers Christmas, Wisconsin, Zoo Land, Recycling, Hiking, and Midwest Fish. 
 
 
HELP: 
If you need help during any game, you can say help and some contextual help will be provided.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
